questions.question: She wouldn’t have lost her job, ………………………… she had met her targets.
questions.description: If is used to express a condition.

questions.question: ………………………. she arrives now, we will have to go without her.
questions.description: Unless also expresses a condition. It means if not.

questions.question: I don’t know …………………………… I will have time.
…………………………… she invited me, I would not go to her party.
questions.description: Even if refers to the present or future.

questions.question: I will do it …………………………….. you like it or not.
I admired him ……………………………… people said that he was a traitor.
questions.description: Although is used to connect two contrasting ideas.

questions.question: She missed school ……………………………… she was ill.
She was sacked ……………………………… the manager was not happy with her performance.
………………………… she gets good treatment, she will not survive.
……………………….. it was a holiday, I spent the whole day in bed.
questions.description: As can introduce the reason for something.

questions.question: She was so beautiful ……………………………. everybody admired her.
I went home ………………………………. I was bored.
